questions.question: Which statement best describes the contribution of Voltaire?

choices.answer: He introduced the natural rights to life, liberty, and property.
Convinced people to outlaw torture written into Bill of Rights
Advocated for separation of powers into 3 branches of government
Inspired freedom of religion, thought, and expression

questions.question: Which statement best describes the contribution of John Locke?

choices.answer: He convinced people to outlaw torture that was later in the Bill of Rights.
He introduced the natural rights to life, liberty and property.
Inspired Freedom of Religion, thought, and expression
Advocated for the separation of powers into three branches of government.

questions.question: Which statement best describes the contribution of Montesquieu?

choices.answer: Advocated for the separation of powers into three branches of government
Inspired Freedom of Religion, thought, and expression
He introduced the natural rights to life, liberty and property.
He convinced people to outlaw torture.
